Teaching head bracket wig bracket, aluminum white bracket with travel bag, aluminum alloy, aluminum white, light weight suitable for most training heads, with suitcase, easy for hairdressers and professionals to practice cutting, weaving and inlaying.  Wig model head tripod, hair training head with handbag, suitable for beauty students or anyone practicing hair cutting, weaving, hair cutting practice handbag, easy to carry, very suitable for students, hairdressers, salons, home users, etc.  1. Barber stand bracket with tripod legs, non-slip sleeves, retractable legs.  2. Rotatable head, adjustable rod, adjustable height, can meet your needs.  3. With a bag, easy to carry.  4. Sturdy and durable, tripod legs, higher stability.  5. Suitable for beauty students or anyone practicing cutting, weaving, inlaying 6. Very suitable for salon and family use.  Made of metal aluminum, light and beautiful.  Conical design, stable and easy to fold and unfold.  Comes with a bag for easy collection and carrying.  This tripod stand is designed to help you practice and improve your hairdressing skills.  You can rotate the wig model and adjust the height as needed.  Color:  Aluminum white Folding height:  About 60 cm (with ball head) Unfolded feet: minimum height: about 75 cm (with ball head) Maximum height:  Approximately 135 cm (with ball head) Item weight: approximately 1 kg']

profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality, unprocessed hair products that allow for styling and customization, particularly valuing Brazilian virgin hair for its versatility in creating various hairstyles, including wigs. Their interest in body wave textures reflects a desire for natural appearance and manageable options. The user's recent purchase of a professional tool for practicing hairdressing skills indicates a commitment to enhancing their creative hair styling abilities and suggests they may pursue hair-related activities more seriously, whether for personal use or to assist others, such as students or family members.

This purchase reinforces the user's inclination toward products that cater to both aesthetic outcomes and practical applications in hair care and styling. The positive feedback on their recent acquisition underscores their satisfaction with high-quality items that additionally support their creative endeavors. Overall, the user values quality, versatility, and functionality in their hair products, combining both personal enjoyment and community-oriented experiences in their interactions.
